column3: The Prague Metro is the metropolitan system in the capital of Czech Republic; Prague.

column1: Metro has been started working from the 9th of May 1974. It consists of 3 lines named A; B; C and continues its developing. Today above 40% of Prague citizens use metro at rush hours.
It is the second popular transport system after the Prague Tramways.
column2: The Prague Metro is only metropolitan system in Czech Republic.

column1: Today it has 3 lines and the fourth is under construction.
